This is the first homework of P8105!

# Problem 1

```{r setup,include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

First I create a data frame:

```{r df_create}
df_1 <- tibble(
  norm_samp = rnorm(10),
  logical = norm_samp > 0,
  char = c('a','b','c','d','e','f','g','h','i','g'),
  factor = factor(c('l','l','s','m','m','s','l','s','m','l'))
)
```
